name: Play it again Sam
overview: Play it again Sam is a traditional text adventure made using The Graphic Adventure Creator adventure generation software from Incentive Software. You tell the game what you want to do via a textual interface. In a typical Film Noir fashion, private detective Sam Spoon has fallen upon hard times, work has become increasingly hard to come by. While on the verge of losing his business, he gets a visit from a mysterious dame asking him to track down her sister. The only lead to go by is an envelope with an address on it. The case will take you in directions you do not expect, there are surprises around every corner.
